reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: A study proposing improvements to the import and export processes in India, identifying barriers for the food industry operating in India in order to facilitate economic growth

description.narrative: Develop proposals for the improvement of the IT infrastructure of India's food regulator, to streamline the process of food imports and exports and reduce the burden on compliant businesses, based on global best practices. This will generate opportunities for international businesses in the food sector, bringing potential benefits to British businesses in sectors where they are well placed to compete. [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
